quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"greenhouse"字面拆解为"green"+"house"，误判为"绿色的房子"，忽略其"温室"的核心词义
quiz_item.sentence: Farmers use **greenhouses** to grow fresh vegetables like tomatoes and peppers during cold winter months.
